title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.5 - Hearing officers; assignment of hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.5 - Hearing officers; assignment of hearings

State Regulations

Where the commissioners themselves do not conduct a hearing, it shall be conducted by a hearing officer to be known as an administrative
judge appointed by and directly responsible to the commissioners who shall be
an attorney-at-law in either the State of New York or New Jersey. Hearings
shall be assigned to a particular administrative judge by the commission or by
a designee of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
6.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
